Summary: Asent from Canistere Resovour to jet flight path then disapered
trends: There have been no other sightings in Vernon Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI have seen this craft a number of time's leaveing the water of Canistere Resovour, as I drove east on canistere rd at dusk . I have also seen a number of times Black or gray ford F150's with all Blacked out window's no plate's, parked along side of the road at the same times that do not belong in the area. I have lived here for 50 yrs and know the basic car's and truck's from our naborhood . we do have Picatiny arsenal on Rt 15 in oak ridge Nj. that recently built a large sight tower in the same area without reason and also they have built a very large amount of wiring from the main power grid tower going under ground hard to explain with out looking at them the craft looks like a peramid shape with a rough black texture very very large with red marking lights at the outer edge's I have seen this craft a number of times in the last few yrs as it leaves the resovour I hope this is of help
